Package org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.sink.ganglia

Class Summary
AbstractGangliaSink This the base class for Ganglia sink classes using metrics2.
GangliaSink30 This code supports Ganglia 3.0
GangliaSink31 This code supports Ganglia 3.1
 

Enum Summary
AbstractGangliaSink.GangliaConfType define enum for various type of conf
AbstractGangliaSink.GangliaSlope ganglia slope values which equal the ordinal
